definition[0]: the feeling that the purpose of your life is to do a particular type of work, especially because it allows you to help other people
example[1]: You missed your vocation  (=you would have been good at a particular job).
example[2]: Jan has a vocation for teaching.
definition[1]: a particular type of work that you feel is right for you
example[3]: At 17 she found her true vocation as a writer.
definition[2]: a strong belief that you have been chosen by God to be a priest or a nun
definition[3]: a job, especially one that involves helping people, that you do because you enjoy it or because you have a strong feeling that it is the purpose of your life to do it
example[4]: As a nurse, she felt she had found her vocation.
example[5]: Sam had missed his vocation - he would have made a perfect lawyer.
